alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:10PM MST until August 07 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 300 PM MST. * At 209 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elks Group Campground, or 30 miles southwest of Winslow, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Sunset Mesa, West Sunset Mesa, Jacks Canyon, Tremaine Lake, Elks Group Campground, Sunset Pass, Soldiers Lake, Long Lake, and Chavez Mountain. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 307 and 327. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
